name: VIII. Decay
description:
Not all of us agree on what direction we were on to develop the Bezmiar. Those who remembered the ascension continued to form harmoniou constructions.Once you have experienced the absolute of golden ratio, you can’t forget about it. Therefore, the goal for each of us was to create a perfect shape.
A kind of monument commemorating the way we traveled. However, the matter it was no longer so obvious for the young.
Those who knew only the existance in three-dimensional plane, had no respect to nothing.
They didn’t care about the stories told by elderly and began making their own divisions. Cutting blocks in a random way, they have completely ambandoned the values. The sacred ratio and our history were completely forgotten.
Apparently we didn’t need it anymore. Youngest were saying the new times need no values. They continued to construct but without any plan. They didn’t understand what to aim for. Slowly our existence began to fall into nothingness. Consumed by oblivion and indifference.
